While it has a distinctive taste that sets it apart from plain water, it doesn't have the intense and complex flavors that some sodas or other beverages might have. It has a recognizable taste that many people associate with it, but it's not overly complex or bold. Considering these factors, I would place Diet Coke closer to the zesty side, but not all the way there.
